div.ab1: naḫost gāv yā gusfand āvardan yā be gale-ye išān šodan va ǧāmdān rā se bār b-āb pādyāvi šostan va dast be gāv nahādan
First he brings a cow or a sheep or he goes to the flock. He washes three times with consacreted wated the container of ǧām and puts his hand on the cow..
avval se serešk ō zamin duḫtan aša.sara. manaŋha miguyad šir ō ǧāmdān midušad digar aṣ̌a.sara. vacaŋha miguyad šir andar ǧāmdān midušad digar aṣ̌a.sara. š́iiaōθəna. miguyad ǧām andar ǧāmdān midušad

First, he milks three drops on the floor. He recites aša.sara manaŋha and milks the consecrated milk into its pitcher. Then, he recites aṣ̌a.sara vacaŋha and milks the consecrated milk into its pitcher. Then he recites aṣ̌a.sara š́iiaōθəna and milks the consecrated milk into its pitcher.
digar dast-e u be gāv nahāde yā gusfand va yaθā. ahū. vairiiō. guftan
va yasnəmca. tā sar āfrīnāmi. gə̄uš. tašne. gə̄uš. urune. taua. gə̄uš. huδā̊ŋhō. urune. se tā har kodām be-vāǧ gerefte bāšand ān vāǧ beguyad pas andar yazešgāh bord ḫod moḥkam nahādan pas durtar āyad

He recites yasnəmca… āfrīnāmi gə̄uš tašne gə̄uš urune tauua gə̄uš huδā̊ŋhō urune. (one of) the three (decidactories depending on the circunstancies): the same one he used when he has taken the vāz, he has to use it now. Later he brings (the milk) to the yazišhngāh, lays it there and goes away.
